scripts.build: napi build --platform -p turborepo-napi --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name turborepo_napi native --js false --dts ../js/index.d.ts && mkdir -p js/dist && cp js/index.js js/dist/index.js && cp js/index.d.ts js/dist/index.d.ts
scripts.build:release: napi build --release --platform -p turborepo-napi --cargo-cwd ../../ --cargo-name turborepo_napi native --js false
